1 #include "lib/uav_local_coverage.h"
2 
3 uav_local_coverage::uav_local_coverage(double altitude) : altitude(altitude), pos(altitude)
4 {
5  // read parameters
6  NodeHandle nh;
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/fov_hor", fov_hor, 1.236);
8  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/fov_ver", fov_ver, 0.970);
9  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/local_steps", max_steps, 20);
10 
11  // init number of search steps
12  steps = 0;
13 
14  // init local coordinate origin
15  // it is the center of the circle that defines the involute
16  double distance, direction;
17  compute_involute(distance, direction);
18  // invert direction to reach origin from current pose
19  // the current pose is the 0th step on the involute (x = radius a, y = 0)
20  direction += M_PI;
21  origin = pos.get_pose();
22 }
23 
24 behavior_state_t uav_local_coverage::step ()
25 {
26  // update position information
27  spinOnce();
28 
29  // next search step
30  ++steps;
31 
32  // next goal
33  geometry_msgs::Pose goal;
34 
35  // reached maximum number of steps, stop local coverage
36  if (steps >= max_steps) {
37  ROS_ERROR("Reached maximum steps!");
38  return STATE_ABORTED;
39  }
40 
41  // compute new goal
42  else {
43  goal = select_goal();
44 
45  // reached environment boundary, stop local coverage
46  if (pos.out_of_bounds(goal)) {
47  ROS_ERROR("Goal (%.2f,%.2f) out of bounds!", goal.position.x, goal.position.y);
48  return STATE_ABORTED;
49  }
50  }
51 
52  // move to new goal
53  if (pos.move(goal) == false) {
54  ROS_ERROR("Cannot move to goal!");
55  return STATE_ABORTED;
56  }
57 
58  // return state to action server
59  return STATE_ACTIVE;
60 }
61 
62 void uav_local_coverage::compute_involute (double &distance, double &direction)
63 {
64  // parameters for circle involute
65  double a = altitude * tan(fov_hor / 2) / M_PI; // radius
66  double b = altitude * tan(fov_ver / 2) * 2; // step size
67 
68  // compute local coordinates using involute
69  double s = b * steps; // arc length
70  double t = sqrt(2 * s / a); // tangential angle
71  double x = a * (cos(t) + t * sin(t));
72  double y = a * (sin(t) - t * cos(t));
73 
74  // compute distance and heading from local origin
75  distance = hypot(x, y);
76  direction = atan2(y, x);
77 }
78 
79 geometry_msgs::Pose uav_local_coverage::select_goal ()
80 {
81  // compute heading and distance for current step
82  double distance, direction;
83  compute_involute(distance, direction);
84 
85  // compute gps coordinats of goal position
86  return pos.compute_goal(origin, distance, direction);
87 }
